snippet.title: Three Of Us – Release Gameplay
snippet.description:
Developer's run on hardest difficulty of my new game Three Of Us which is going to be released today (22.03.2020) at 2pm CET on https://esosek.itch.io/three-of-us

Three Of Us is a singleplayer turn-based card game with a deck-building features. You may play full content for free in the browser or download it to your PC.

Thank you for playing!

Credits
Background music by PlayOnLoop.com licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Tavern background by AnthonyAvon https://www.deviantart.com/anthonyavon

Forest and menu backgrounds by CraftPix https://craftpix.net/

Card art by various artists at https://arcmage.org/artwork Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License
